metadata.title: CVE-2020-8813 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
graph_realtime.php in Cacti 1.2.8 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary OS commands via shell metacharacters in a cookie, if a guest user has the graph real-time privilege.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-8813` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.2.16+ds2-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.16+ds2-1ubuntu1').
